comment._content: On Jan 20, 1915, he was due to give testimony at the Federal Commission on Industrial Relations at "the City Hall" according to the NYT of Jan 20, 1915. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E02E4DF1E3FE633A...

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Banker and Corporate Director (and many other things), en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jacob_Schiff More on the Walsh Commission, then taking testimony in New York: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commission_on_Industrial_Relations
